Posts.Content: ScaredAussieMum wrote: Hello. Im New to this and am not sure if I've posted in correct area. Any advice would be appreciated please. I had a lumpectomy in Oct 2017, invasive ductal breast cancer, 17mm, grade 3, her2 positive, er positive. Had 9 lymph nodes removed which surgeon was sure had cancer, but they all came back clear of cancer. Finished chemo beginning of February 2018, 5 weeks in to radiotherapy quite burnt in armpit - swollen, numb and weeping slightly. Scar and immediate area red and swollen. Intramammary lymph node found swollen near operation scar and burn area. What could be causing please? TIA Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Intramammary lymph node ScaredAussieMum ScaredAussieMum
